page.title: 12Ogbourne cafe and garage
page.content: The cafe is joined to the garage and lots of truck drivers stop there for a break.The garage is little and doesn't use its pumps now.It's by the main road.The garage has got some toilets in a hut.My next door neighbour works in the garage, so does my friend. They've got a shed where cars are repaired. The cafe has got 4 games machines and a carpark behind the cafe. The cafe is a nice place and they serve hot and cold food.The people who work in the garage have their food there.The cafe is closed all Sunday and it opens weekdays from 7.30 am to 5.30pm, its busiest times are 8.30 to 10.30 am.On busy days they have about 150 to 200 customers.
